messages.title: FAIR IS WORTH FIGHTING FOR
messages.content: Dr Derek Chase has been a GP in Westminster for over 20 years. He is committed to developing high quality local services, reducing our impact on the environment and creating sustainable healthy communities.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: No previous generation has faced the issues we do today. Our use of resources is unsustainable and people feel powerless. This affects all of us, not just our lives but those of our children and their children. The time is now – we cannot delay the change.
Dr Chase supports small business relevant to the local community such as cheese shops, post offices and markets.
Dr Chase supports reducing our carbon emissions by 10% in 2010, with low cost insulation and new carbon boilers.
Investing in sustainable public transport – safer bicycle lanes, more pedestrian only areas, less polluting vehicles and improved public transport.
Promoting the idea of a 'Living Wage' for better living standards.
Pledging to create a million new jobs.

issues.environment: Dr Derek Chase is committed to developing high quality local services, reducing our impact on the environment and creating sustainable healthy communities.
issues.health: Dr Derek Chase has been a GP in Westminster for over 20 years. He is committed to... creating sustainable healthy communities.

leaflet.personalStatement: Dr Derek Chase has been a GP in Westminster for over 20 years. He is committed to sustainable healthcare and building community resilience.

images.caption: Dr Derek Chase talking with constituents.
Promotion of a 'Living Wage' for better living standards.
Commitment to creating a million new jobs.
Dr Derek Chase with healthcare professionals, emphasizing the protection of our NHS.
